rules.text: Prove you Read the Rules: Your application must include the CONFIRMATION PASSWORD at the end of the full Etiquette. Applications without it will be rejected unless sufficiently detailed.

Be Decent: Do not insult, doxx or harass. 
Do not spread conspiracy theories and misinformation.
Be Sentient: Do not create bot or brand accounts without permission.
Be Active: Crossposting is only allowed if you regularly check your account.
Be Lawful: No content illegal in Germany, no sexual content without content warnings, no sexual content involving animals, minors, or sexual assault.
Be Mindful: Respect the needs of other users. Use content warnings and describe your media.
You should still read the full etiquette on this instance's website. These rules are merely a summary.
The password to add to your application is: Confelicity.

records.text: If you want to sound your audio's in flash files with rewerb like a huge room with some boxes, do the following: dry: 0.0 between 1.0 (0.0 is rather for rooms with speakers on every wall, while 1.0 is rather for a room where there is only one speaker which is in the pretty middle of the recording). weed: 1.0. room size and damb: 0.3 to 1.0 (use values larger than 0.8 for really large halls or a chourch). width: 0.0 for mono fields, could be a good microphone in mono such as smartphone ones on what's app. 0.5 for rather small rooms, 1.0 for larger ones, and anything between these for room sizes between that.

records.text: The American Council of the Blind national Convention continues on this afternoon, with lots of things to listen to on ACB Media. All times are eastern.2:00 PM: "Productivity Apps on Your iOS Device - Helping You Work Smarter, Not Harder" on Media 2.2:00 PM: "What Can be Accomplished When We Work Together (from LUA)" on Media 3.2:00 PM: "Writing Image Description for Graphic Novels and Other Highly Visual Content" on Media 4.2:00 PM: "For Everyone Interested in Amateur Radio" on Media 5.3:30 PM: "Audio Description and Dance: Learn about Techniques and Strategies for Expanding Understanding of Types of Dance" on Media 2.3:30 PM: "Why You Should Get a Public Library Card" on Media 3.3:30 PM: "SASI - Supporting Family Members with Dual Sensory Loss" on Media 4.5:00 PM: "Lessons in Leadership (ACBL)" on Media 2.5:00 PM: "P.R.E.P for Successful Networking (ACB NG)" on Media 3.There are many ways to listen to ACB Media.  On the web at https://www.acbmedia.org/home/streams/You can use the ACB Media Alexa Skill.Or, get the ACB Link app in your app store of choice. #ACB #ACB24

records.text: If you want to sound your audio's in flash files with rewerb like a huge room with some boxes, do the following: dry: 0.0 between 1.0 (0.0 is rather for rooms with speakers on every wall, while 1.0 is rather for a room where there is only one speaker which is in the pretty middle of the recording). weed: 1.0. room size and damb: 0.3 to 1.0 (use values larger than 0.8 for really large halls or a chourch). width: 0.0 for mono fields, could be a good microphone in mono such as smartphone ones on what's app. 0.5 for rather small rooms, 1.0 for larger ones, and anything between these for room sizes between that.

records.text: If you want to sound your audio's in flash files with rewerb like a huge room with some boxes, do the following: dry: 0.0 between 1.0 (0.0 is rather for rooms with speakers on every wall, while 1.0 is rather for a room where there is only one speaker which is in the pretty middle of the recording). weed: 1.0. room size and damb: 0.3 to 1.0 (use values larger than 0.8 for really large halls or a chourch). width: 0.0 for mono fields, could be a good microphone in mono such as smartphone ones on what's app. 0.5 for rather small rooms, 1.0 for larger ones, and anything between these for room sizes between that.

records.text: The American Council of the Blind national Convention continues on this afternoon, with lots of things to listen to on ACB Media. All times are eastern.2:00 PM: "Productivity Apps on Your iOS Device - Helping You Work Smarter, Not Harder" on Media 2.2:00 PM: "What Can be Accomplished When We Work Together (from LUA)" on Media 3.2:00 PM: "Writing Image Description for Graphic Novels and Other Highly Visual Content" on Media 4.2:00 PM: "For Everyone Interested in Amateur Radio" on Media 5.3:30 PM: "Audio Description and Dance: Learn about Techniques and Strategies for Expanding Understanding of Types of Dance" on Media 2.3:30 PM: "Why You Should Get a Public Library Card" on Media 3.3:30 PM: "SASI - Supporting Family Members with Dual Sensory Loss" on Media 4.5:00 PM: "Lessons in Leadership (ACBL)" on Media 2.5:00 PM: "P.R.E.P for Successful Networking (ACB NG)" on Media 3.There are many ways to listen to ACB Media.  On the web at https://www.acbmedia.org/home/streams/You can use the ACB Media Alexa Skill.Or, get the ACB Link app in your app store of choice. #ACB #ACB24
